messages.subject: I NEED YOUR URGENT ASSITANCE
messages.body:
martins2_williams@post.cz 


 FROM THE DESK OF:DR MARTINS WILLAMS,DIRECTOR,
 PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION FEDERAL MINISTRY OF HEALTH
 AND
 SOCIAL SERVICES, DAKAR SENEGAL,
 EMAIL;martins2_williams_01@fastermail.com
 
STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL

 DEAR Sir/Madam,
 TRANSFER OF US$25.5 MILLION INTO A PERSONAL/COMPANY'S OFFSHORE ACCOUNT
 

 Based on the information gathered from the Ministry
 of Trade and Industry,we intend to solicit your
 assistance on this transaction with you on the
 assumption that you will not disappoint us.
 

 We have Twenty Five Million, Five Hundred Thousand
 United States Dollars (US$25,500,000.00) which we
 made over time from over inflated contracts in my
 Ministry (Federal Ministry of Health and Social
 Services).
 
We are seeking your assistance and permission to
 remit this amount into your account or any other
 nominated account you can provide for us.
 Your commission will be 20% of the total sum, 10%
 for expenses and the remaining 70% is for my
 colleagues and myself.


 Could you please notify me of your acceptance to
 carry out this transaction urgently by e-mail only
 on the receipt of this message.
 Kindly, acknowledge the receipt of this letter by
 sending to me by email a copy of this letter with
 your private Tel. And Fax number.
 I shall in turn inform you of the modalities for a
 formal application to secure the necessary approvals
 for the immediate release of this fund into your
 account.
 


 Thanks for your co-operation.
 Yours faithfully,
 Dr.Martins Willams
 YOU CAN AS WELL REACH ME THROUGH THIS
 EMAIL:martins2_williams_01@fastermail.com
messages.raw:
MARTINS WILLIAMS

Subject: I NEED YOUR URGENT ASSITANCE

martins2_williams@post.cz

FROM THE DESK OF:DR MARTINS WILLAMS,DIRECTOR,
PROJECT IMPLEMENTATION FEDERAL MINISTRY OF HEALTH
AND
SOCIAL SERVICES, DAKAR SENEGAL,
EMAIL;martins2_williams_01@fastermail.com

STRICTLY CONFIDENTIAL

DEAR Sir/Madam,
TRANSFER OF US$25.5 MILLION INTO A PERSONAL/COMPANY'S OFFSHORE ACCOUNT

Based on the information gathered from the Ministry of Trade and Industry,we intend to solicit your assistance on this transaction with you on the assumption that you will not disappoint us.

We have Twenty Five Million, Five Hundred Thousand United States Dollars (US$25,500,000.00) which we made over time from over inflated contracts in my Ministry (Federal Ministry of Health and Social Services).

We are seeking your assistance and permission to remit this amount into your account or any other nominated account you can provide for us. Your commission will be 20% of the total sum, 10% for expenses and the remaining 70% is for my colleagues and myself.

Dear reader, in plain English, this means that "Martins Williams" (not his real name) is pretending to have skimmed (imaginary) public funds, which he wants you to help him embezzle. If this is not clear, please read (or re-read) the main page and its various cautionary links.
And now on with our regularly scheduled scambait.

Could you please notify me of your acceptance to carry out this transaction urgently by e-mail only on the receipt of this message.
Kindly, acknowledge the receipt of this letter by sending to me by email a copy of this letter with your private Tel. And Fax number.
I shall in turn inform you of the modalities for a formal application to secure the necessary approvals for the immediate release of this fund into your account.

Modalities = you sending a money order to pay for (imaginary) bureaucratic fees or (imaginary) lawyers' fees to take care of paperwork for you.

Thanks for your co-operation.
Yours faithfully,
Dr.Martins Willams
YOU CAN AS WELL REACH ME THROUGH THIS
EMAIL:martins2_williams_01@fastermail.com

messages.body:
Dear Dr. Williams, 


Thank you for your fascinating note. Much as we are
interested, I fear that it is not meant for us. I am
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE, and I am Head of Special
Operations at Her Majesty's Foreign Office. 


What do you wish us to do with your e-mail? 


Yours ever, 


Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL

Date: 23 Aug 2004, 06:11:16 AM

Dear Dr. Williams,

Thank you for your fascinating note. Much as we are interested, I fear that it is not meant for us. I am Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE, and I am Head of Special Operations at Her Majesty's Foreign Office.

What do you wish us to do with your e-mail?

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.subject: FURTHER CLEARIFICATION
messages.body:
DAER LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, 


 I APPRECIATE YOUR KIND REPLY AND UNDERSTANDING
 TOWARDS REALIZATION 
 OF THIS FUNDS WITH YOU,TOGETHER YOUR HIGH LEVEL OF
 MATURITY,TRANSPARENCY AND SIMPLICITY.I THANK YOU FOR
 BEING ABLE TO SEPARATE THE WEEDS FROM THE
 WHEATS.**THERE IS NOTTING AS GOOD AS THE ORIGINAL. 


 I WILL START BY PUTTING THINGS CLEAR TO YOU.
 YOU HAVE TO DEFINITELY LISTEN TO MY ADVICES AND
 INSTRUCTIONS. 
 YOU WILL BE PORTRAYED AS THE BONAFIDE CONTRACTOR
 THAT DID THE SAID CONTRACT WITH OUR MINISTRY.ALL THE
 INFORMATION ABOUT THE CONTRACT DETAILS WILL BE
 RELEASED TO YOU WHEN THE TIMES COMES,TOGETHER A TEXT
 OF APPLICATION TENDER TO THE BOARD OF VERIFICATION
 DEPARTMENT OF THIS MINISTRY. 


 WE ALSO HAVE ALL THE INFORMATION THE MINISTRY WILL
 REQUIRE FROM YOU TO SUBMIT TO THEM AS THE TRUE
 CONTRACTOR WHO HAVE FINISHED THE SAID CONTRACT WHICH
 THIS MINISTRY AWARDED TO YOU,SUCH AS THE JOB
 COMPLETION CERTIFICATE,CONTRACT AWARD CERTIFICATE
 AND TAX CLEARANCE CERTIFICATE. 


 A SERVICE OF ATTORNEY WILL BE EMPLOYED WHO WILL
 TRAVEL TO OUR CAPITAL CITY /DAKAR/ TO START PROCESS
 OF THE REQUIRED CERTIFICATES AS LISTED ABOVE,THE
 ATTORNEY WILL REGISTER YOUR NAME AS THE COMPANY THAT
 EXECUTED THE CONTRACT WITH OUR MINISTRY
 (F.M.H.S.)FEDRAL MINISTRY OF HEALTH HERE IN SENEGAL
 TO BACK UP THIS CLAIM ON YOUR BEHALF HENCE WE WOULD
 NOT WANT ANYTHING TO JEOPARDISE ANY OF US IN THIS
 BUSINESS.   
 I AND MY COLLEAGUES HAVE WORKED IN THIS MINISTRY FOR
 A LONG TIME AND AS SUCH HAS HANDLED SIMILAR
 TRANSACTION OF THIS NATURE BEFORE.WE HAVE A LAID
 DOWN PROCEDURE FOR THIS KIND OF TRANSACTION AND AS
 SUCH HAS ALL THE PROCEDURAL REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS
 TRANSACTION AS YOU CAN UNDERSTAND. 


 NOTE THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS A HITCH FREE ONE AND
 YOU SHOULD
 NOT ENTERTAIN ANY ATOM OF FEAR.IT WILL TAKE ONLY 14
 WORKING DAYS 
 TO FINALISE THIS TRANSACTION UPON SUBMITTION OF THE
 REQUIRED CERTIFICATES BY THE ATTORNEY WHOM WE ARE
 GOING TO EMPLOYED FOR THE PROCUREMENT OF THE
 CERTIFICATES WHICH WILL BE TENDER TO VERIFICATION
 BOARD OF THIS MINISTRY.  


 FOR HELPING US DO THIS YOU WILL BE GIVEN 20% OF THE
 GROSS TOTAL
 FOR GRATIFICATION AND APPRECIATION IN YOUR ASSISTING
 US IN THIS
 TRANSACTION,10% HAS BEEN MAPPED OUT TO TAKE CARE OF
 ALL EXPENCES
 THAT MIGHT BE INCURED IN THIS TRANSACTION IN A BID
 TO MAKE THIS
 TRANSACTION SUCCESS. 


 THE ATTORNEY WILL GET ALL THE FUNDS TRANSFER
 APPROVAL DOCUMENTS
 LEGALLY TO EFFECTS THE TRANSFER.THERE IS NOTTING
 DIFFERENTS FROM 
 THE NORMAL BANK FUND TRANSFER PROCEDURES,THE ONLY
 DIFFERENCE IS THAT WE ARE GOING TO INCLUDE YOUR
 PARTICULARS AS THE REAL CONTRACTOR THAT DID THE
 CONTRACT AS TO ENABLE YOU STAND FOR THIS CLAIM. 


 PLEASE I WILL BE GLAD YOU CONFIRM YOUR TELEPHONE AND
 FAX NUMBER SO THAT I CAN CALL YOU POSSIBILY TODAY. 


 I AWAIT YOUR COMMENTS AND RESPONSE IMMEDIATELY FOR
 US TO FORGE
 AHEAD WITHOUT DELAY,GOD BLESS YOU.  
 REGARDS,
 DR MARTINS WILLIAMS.
messages.raw:
MARTINS WILLIAMS

I AND MY COLLEAGUES HAVE WORKED IN THIS MINISTRY FOR A LONG TIME AND AS SUCH HAS HANDLED SIMILAR TRANSACTION OF THIS NATURE BEFORE.WE HAVE A LAID DOWN PROCEDURE FOR THIS KIND OF TRANSACTION AND AS SUCH HAS ALL THE PROCEDURAL REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS TRANSACTION AS YOU CAN UNDERSTAND.

NOTE THAT THIS TRANSACTION IS A HITCH FREE ONE AND YOU SHOULD NOT ENTERTAIN ANY ATOM OF FEAR.IT WILL TAKE ONLY 14 WORKING DAYS TO FINALISE THIS TRANSACTION UPON SUBMITTION OF THE REQUIRED CERTIFICATES BY THE ATTORNEY WHOM WE ARE GOING TO EMPLOYED FOR THE PROCUREMENT OF THE CERTIFICATES WHICH WILL BE TENDER TO VERIFICATION BOARD OF THIS MINISTRY.

FOR HELPING US DO THIS YOU WILL BE GIVEN 20% OF THE GROSS TOTAL FOR GRATIFICATION AND APPRECIATION IN YOUR ASSISTING US IN THIS TRANSACTION,10% HAS BEEN MAPPED OUT TO TAKE CARE OF ALL EXPENCES THAT MIGHT BE INCURED IN THIS TRANSACTION IN A BID TO MAKE THIS TRANSACTION SUCCESS.

PLEASE I WILL BE GLAD YOU CONFIRM YOUR TELEPHONE AND FAX NUMBER SO THAT I CAN CALL YOU POSSIBILY TODAY.

I AWAIT YOUR COMMENTS AND RESPONSE IMMEDIATELY FOR US TO FORGE AHEAD WITHOUT DELAY,GOD BLESS YOU. REGARDS,
DR MARTINS WILLIAMS.

messages.body:
Dear Dr. Williams, 


Thank you for your note. 


I have passed it on to Her Majesty Princess Candice
Mercedes Windsor, and she has asked me to tell you
that she is interested in your little plan. 


However, we have only just met, as it were. You must
prove that you are not just a ruffian on the make, to
use the vernacular. 


Have you any documentary evidence to support your
claims? They seem - forgive me - rather outlandish and
not all together legal to me. 


Yours ever, 


Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:

Have you any documentary evidence to support your claims? They seem - forgive me - rather outlandish and not all together legal to me.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL, 


 RECEIVE YOUR MAIL AND NOTED ALL YOU SAID. 


 MY SISTER I THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR THE KIND
 UNDERSTAND PUT TOGETHGER BY YOU FROM WHAT I READ IN
 YOUR MAIL. 


 I WILL WANT YOU TO SEND ME YOUR FIRST NAME AND
 SECOND NAME,TOGETHER YOUR HOUSE ADDRESS,THE REQUIRED
 INFORMATIONS WILL BE USED TO COMPLETE THE CONTRACT
 AWARED CERTIFICATES AND JOB COMPLETION CERTIFICATES
 WHICH WE WILL EMPLOY A SERVICE OF ATTORNEY WHO WILL
 SECURE ALL THE CERTIFICATES FROM THE VERIOUS
 MINISTRIES HERE IN OUR COUNTRY DAKAR SENEGAL. 


 I AM MY PARTNERS ARE GOING TO TAKE CARE OF
 ATTORNEY'S CHARGES REGARDING THE CERTIFICATES,SO ALL
 I NEED FROM YOU IS TO EQUIP US WITH REQUIRED
 INFORMATIONS UPON RECEIPT OF THIS MAIL SO THAT THE
 CERTIFICATES WILL BE SECURED AND IMMEDIATELY SEND TO
 YOU ACCORDINGLY. 


 SECONDLY,I WILL LIKE TO KNOW YOUR AGE PLEASE BECAUSE
 I DO NOT WANT ANYTHING LIKE I SAID IN MY EARLIER
 MAIL THAT WILL JEOPARDISE THIS PROSPECT OK. 


 PLEASE UPON RECEIPT OF THE REQUIRED INFORMATION AS I
 SAID,I WILL DISCUSS WITH MY PARTNERS HERE IN THE
 MINISTRY SO THAT ACTION WILL COMMENCE WITHOUT
 FURTHER DELAY AS YOU KNOW THAT TRANSACTION OF THIS
 NATURE REQUIRED URGENT ATTENTION WHICH I ALSO WILL
 ADVICE YOU FOLLOW UP EVERY ADVICE GIVEN SO THAT WE
 CAN REALIZE THIS GREAT GOLD TOGETHER. 


 WAITING TO HEAR MORE POSITIVE RESPOSE FROM YOU. 


 REGARDS, 
 DR MARTIN WILLIAM

messages.body:
Dear Dr. Williams,


Thank you for your note.


Whilst we are interested in taking matters further, I
must insist that you sign a temporary Oath of
Allegiance to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II. 


The Special Operations Department of Her Majesty's
Foreign and Commonwealth Office handles all matters
relating to the UK's national interest both at home
and abroad. 


Therefore, security and discretion are paramount. In
any case, I wish to see that you get exactly what you
deserve and swearing an Oath, which will prove your
genuine intentions (though I have an idea what these
are) and commitment to this cause.


Are you prepared to do this?
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL

Date: 25 Aug 2004, 02:14:33 PM

Dear Dr. Williams,

Thank you for your note.

Whilst we are interested in taking matters further, I must insist that you sign a temporary Oath of Allegiance to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II.

The Special Operations Department of Her Majesty's Foreign and Commonwealth Office handles all matters relating to the UK's national interest both at home and abroad.

Therefore, security and discretion are paramount. In any case, I wish to see that you get exactly what you deserve and swearing an Oath, which will prove your genuine intentions (though I have an idea what these are) and commitment to this cause.

Are you prepared to do this?

messages.body:
Dear Mrs Agatha Bristol,


 I receive your mail all contents well noted with
 thanks.


 First,let me refer you back once again to my first
 ever mail which is the proposal i sent you regarding
 this contract which was awarded to my ministry two
 years ago. 


 Please note that i am a man of age of 51yrs old,with
 my wife and 5 children,i will not want you to
 jeopardise me hence i will always be straight with
 you regarding concluding this business ok.


 Secondly regarding your mail that i will swaer an
 oath before you now believe what i am saying,i think
 it wil be more better we sign aggrement stating that
 we have agree to work together regarding concluding
 this business together,as myself have my partners
 down here and we are still in active service which
 will give up our job upon conclussion of this
 business with,so if you really want to work with us
 i think we both has to be straight to each other
 otherwise we can not get what we want.


 Her majesty as you do say,is she the one i'm
 directing all this mails to or to some other
 person?.please i demand you give me your telephone
 numbers for me to give you a call immediately today.


 Waiting for your urgent reply.


 Regards,
 Dr Martins Williams.
messages.raw:
MARTINS WILLIAMS

Dear Mrs Agatha Bristol,

I receive your mail all contents well noted with thanks.

First,let me refer you back once again to my first ever mail which is the proposal i sent you regarding this contract which was awarded to my ministry two years ago.

Please note that i am a man of age of 51yrs old,with my wife and 5 children,i will not want you to jeopardise me hence i will always be straight with you regarding concluding this business ok.

Secondly regarding your mail that i will swaer an oath before you now believe what i am saying,i think it wil be more better we sign aggrement stating that we have agree to work together regarding concluding this business together,as myself have my partners down here and we are still in active service which will give up our job upon conclussion of this business with,so if you really want to work with us i think we both has to be straight to each other otherwise we can not get what we want.

Her majesty as you do say,is she the one i'm directing all this mails to or to some other person?.please i demand you give me your telephone numbers for me to give you a call immediately today.

Waiting for your urgent reply.

Regards,
Dr Martins Williams.

messages.body:
27/08/2004 14:27


Dear Dr. Martins,


Thank you for your note.


Please address me as Lady Agatha. My marital status is
not your concern. 


Whilst I appreciate your thoughts regarding the Oath
of Allegiance, I must remind you that you approached
us with this rather unorthodox approach. 


You are potentially dealing with the Royal Family, Dr.
Williams. Discrection and confidentiality are assured.
But we must insist on the Oath of Allegiance.


Please do reply as soon as possible. 


Yours ever, 


Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:

Please do reply as soon as possible.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol, 


 Sorry that you have not heard from me. 


 I was waiting for the attorney to complete the
 memoradum of understanding regarding championing
 this business between both of us to great high. 


 My sister,i will be glad you see this business as a
 matter of urgency,please do find attachment to see
 the agreement of understand and complete the
 remaining space by signing your signature and return
 it back to me so that we can forge ahead for the
 conclussion of this business. 


 Waiting for your urgent reply soonest today. 


 Regards,
 Dr Martins Williams.
messages.raw:
MARTINS WILLIAMS

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

Sorry that you have not heard from me.

I was waiting for the attorney to complete the memoradum of understanding regarding championing this business between both of us to great high.

My sister,i will be glad you see this business as a matter of urgency,please do find attachment to see the agreement of understand and complete the remaining space by signing your signature and return it back to me so that we can forge ahead for the conclussion of this business.

Waiting for your urgent reply soonest today.

Regards,
Dr Martins Williams.

messages.body:
My dear Dr. Martins, 


Thank you for your e-mail. 


Your little attachment was most endearing, but whilst
it outlines our agreement in princple it does not
offer any type of reassurance to us. 


You simply must sign a temporary Oath of Allegiance as
I advised you before, old chap.  


Are you prepared to do this? I have to tell you that
Chief Um Bongo is ready to sign. 


Please advise me as soon as possible. 


Yours ever, 
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL

Date: 03 Sep 2004, 01:46:05 AM

My dear Dr. Martins,

Thank you for your e-mail.

Your little attachment was most endearing, but whilst it outlines our agreement in princple it does not offer any type of reassurance to us.

You simply must sign a temporary Oath of Allegiance as I advised you before, old chap.

Are you prepared to do this? I have to tell you that Chief Um Bongo is ready to sign.

Please advise me as soon as possible.

Yours ever,
Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

messages.body:
Dear Lady Agatha Bristol, 


I receive your mail and thank you for the reply.


I am worried that after sending you the memorandum
of understaing that you are still not ok with it,i
don't what you want me to do my sister hence i told
you earlier that i am a man of age and will not want
anything to jeopardise this business.


I will suggest you give me your telephone number so
that i will call you from here immediately for us to
talk on phone for better understanding.


Regards, 
Dr Martins Williams.
messages.raw:
MARTINS WILLIAMS

Dear Lady Agatha Bristol,

I receive your mail and thank you for the reply.

I am worried that after sending you the memorandum of understaing that you are still not ok with it,i don't what you want me to do my sister hence i told you earlier that i am a man of age and will not want anything to jeopardise this business.

I will suggest you give me your telephone number so that i will call you from here immediately for us to talk on phone for better understanding.

Regards,
Dr Martins Williams.

messages.body:
Dear Dr. Williams, 


Thank you for your note. 


Earlier in our correspondence, I gave you the
instructions for taking a Temporary Oath of
Allegiance. 


I shall do so again here:


Type out the following text, sign it and include your
photograph. E-mail the document to me. 


'I, Dr. Martins Williams, being of sound mind, on this
day.......<enter date>.......do by humble merkin swear
total allegiance to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II in
all fey twiglets appertaining to Her Right Royal
Business' 


Do hurry up, old chap. Mr Abacha called me this
morning with a remarkably similiar scheme to your own.


And please don't refer to me as your sister - let us
keep this professional, please. 


Yours ever, 


Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE 
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London
messages.raw:
LADY AGATHA BRISTOL

Dear Dr. Williams,

Thank you for your note.

Earlier in our correspondence, I gave you the instructions for taking a Temporary Oath of Allegiance.

I shall do so again here:

Type out the following text, sign it and include your photograph. E-mail the document to me.

'I, Dr. Martins Williams, being of sound mind, on this day.......<enter date>.......do by humble merkin swear total allegiance to Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth II in all fey twiglets appertaining to Her Right Royal Business'

Do hurry up, old chap. Mr Abacha called me this morning with a remarkably similiar scheme to your own.

And please don't refer to me as your sister - let us keep this professional, please.

Yours ever,

Lady Agatha Bristol, CBE
Head of Special Operations, Foreign Office, London

This scambait did not result in another Signed Oath, but the Foreign Office have obtained nearly enough Oaths to cover all the cracks in the paint on the Trophy Wall by now, and no doubt more will be forthcoming.
